trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Link"></xref> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter> class to convert links of one type to another type, and to access standard values and subordinate properties.
Access this class through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref> class.

Retrieves a value that determines if this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref> can convert an object having the specified context and source type to the native type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> providing contextual information about the object to be converted.
The type of the object to be converted.
`true` if this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref> can convert the specified object; otherwise, `false`.
Retrieves a value that determines if this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref> can convert an object having the specified context to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> providing contextual information about the object to be converted.
The type to convert the object to.
`true` if this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref> can convert the specified object; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified object to the native type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> providing contextual information about the object to be converted.
Cultural attributes of the object to be converted.
If this parameter is `null`, the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture"></xref> property value is used.
The object to be converted.
The converted object.
The text of the object to be converted could not be parsed.
Converts the specified object to another type.
The most common conversion is from one <xref:System.String> to another <xref:System.String>.
The default implementation calls <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> on the object if the object is valid and if the `destinationType` is <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> providing contextual information about the object to be converted.
Cultural attributes of the object to be converted.
If this parameter is `null`, the <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture"></xref> property value is used.
The object to be converted.
The type to convert the object to.
The converted object.
The object cannot be converted to the destination type.
The destinationType is `null`.
